name: D.O.N.G Alfa
description:
Player 1 Controls: 

W = Up 

S = Down 

Player 2 Controls

Up Arrow  = Up

Down Arrow = You guess it Down 

Sorry for the camera view, I hope to have that fixed soon. 

If you're interested in the concept please be sure to let me know so I could continue working on it. If the idea of DONGs is not for you well then I will know to move on. 

Follow my dev journey on IG @ jeff_jupiter
